title: Lucian
description:
LUCIAN

My life was 
FUCKED
 up, but I had everything I needed to survive.Then, I met her.I saved her 
LIFE
, then put all of us at 
RISK
 because I couldn’t stay away.Falling for Luca was the 
WORST
 thing I could’ve done.Breaking her was 
HELL
.

LUCA

 He pulled me from the water and left with my 
HEART
.Who Lucian really was, I was 
NEVER
 to know.He had his 
SECRETS
, and even though I was okay with that as long as I had him.Then, he broke me.I tried to put my 
SHATTERED
 heart back together, but he’d taken part of it with him.I had to get it back. But, to do that, I had to save 
HIM
.
author: Dawn Doyle
